value.title: Service Robotics Market Top Trends Accentuating, Size by 2024
value.excerpt: The service robotics market is expected to grow at a substantial rate driven by the system's high efficiency, reliability and convenience as compared to conventional labor. Integration of artificial intelligence (AI) and proliferation of IoT is bringing key transformations in the market.

value.title: CES 2021: LG unveils artificial intelligence for "at-home" products
value.excerpt: From sanitizing robots to a self-cleaning water dispenser, LG Electronics is redefining what it means to be at home.

value.title: The best robot vacuums of CES 2021
value.excerpt: At CES 2021, we're seeing vacuums that will be able to clean your home better than ever before. Here are some of the best robot vacuums on display this year.

value.title: All hail your new robot vac overlord: iRobot Roomba i3+ is here
value.excerpt: They’ve dusted down the iRobot robot vac range and added the Roomba i3+ which looks and performs a treat iRobot has taken the dust covers off its brand new model, the Roomba i3+. This manufacturer is known for producing some of the best robot vacuum cleaners money can buy and the latest addition to the Roomba robot vacuum lineup comes packed with new features.

value.title: How the use of robotics is evolving at MRFs
value.excerpt: A recycling facility operator and a robotics company say artificial intelligence is providing materials recovery firms with much-needed data to analyze changes in the recycling stream. That’s in addition to sortation improvements.

value.title: Self-driving truck company Kodiak Robotics hauls in honor at CES after reaching Texas milestone
value.excerpt: The company completed two 800-mile roundtrip commercial shipments in December between Dallas and Houston relying only on Kodiak’s autonomous driving system.

value.title: Samsung's JetBot 90 AI+ Robot Vacuum Doubles as a Roving Security Camera
value.excerpt: The JetBot 90 AI+ works with the Samsung SmartThings app to let you access its integrated camera and keep an eye on your home from wherever you are.

value.title: AI devs claim they’ve created a robot that demonstrates a ‘primitive form of empathy’
value.excerpt: Columbia University researchers have developed a robot that displays a "glimmer of empathy" by visually predicting how another machine will behave.

value.title: Ambarella unveils 8K AI vision processor for car, drone, and robot cameras
value.excerpt: Ambarella has unveiled the CV5 AI Vision Processor to handle 8K image processing for car, consumer, crone, and robot cameras.

value.title: The AI-Powered Robot That Learnt Curling Using Adaptive Deep Reinforcement Learning

value.title: Updated: Amp Robotics raises $55M in financing
value.excerpt: The company raised financing from new investors Valor Equity Partners and GV as well as several existing investors.

value.title: Meet the robots taking the virtual stage at CES 2021
value.excerpt: This year's all-digital CES is going to be a tough one for everyone involved, but it may be even harder if you're a robot. Robots can pique people's interest via the written word or videos, but there's nothing like showing people what you can do in person to really make a good first impression.

value.title: Robotics Ready for Its Moment as Pandemic Headwinds Abate

value.title: Robots in Retail: What Investors Need to Know

value.title: Washington Post Live to host “Artificial Intelligence in Health Care” with presenting sponsor GE
value.excerpt: Speakers will discuss how artificial intelligence is changing how doctors work, drugs are developed, patients are diagnosed, surgeries are performed, and how it is used in the fight against COVID-19

value.title: Quadriplegic man feeds himself a Twinkie utilizing AI, robotics, and brain waves
value.excerpt: While many a Twinkie eater probably doesn’t spend all that much time savoring their tasty treat, that’s not the case for Robert "Buz" Chmielewski, a quadriplegic for the last 30 years, who just fed himself one of Hostess’ time-honored (and time-defying) yellow cake creations.

value.title: The U.S. Army’s Robot Tanks Make Great Bait
value.excerpt: The U.S. Army is developing remote-controlled robotic vehicles that, the service hopes, will be able to fight alongside conventional tanks, fighting vehicles and infantry as soon as the 2030s.

value.title: Is Vietnam’s first AI robot the future of education?
value.excerpt: In digitally quicky Vietnam, an AI robot fitted with five "senses" and Google search integration is being equipped to be a teaching assistant.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence in a post-covid world: 2021 and beyond
value.excerpt: COVID-19 has impacted every aspect of our lives including the way we do business. In fact, according to a recent survey by McKinsey, COVID has accelerated companies’ digital transformation journeys.

value.title: After strong 2020, Denver recycling robotics startup rings in new year with $55M Series B funding
value.excerpt: On the back of a strong 2020, the company has closed a large funding round to scale its business to meet a growing demand.

value.title: Self-Driving Cars And Asimov’s Three Laws About Robots
value.excerpt: Asimov's famous Three Laws of robotics are considered in the use case of self-driving cars, and found to be aspirational but not ironclad.
